enchantment.combat_reborn.cleaving.desc: Increases both damage dealt and the duration for which shields are disabled
enchantment.combat_reborn.parry.desc: Reduces the shield strength penalty on a successful parry, and adds a chance for successful parries to block crushing blows
enchantment.combat_reborn.stagger.desc: Applies damage, weakness and slowness to the attacker after a successful parry
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.title: Combat Reborn
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.option.com: Whether custom modified attack damage, speed & reach values should be used for many vanilla and modded weapons. These can be individually configured at the bottom of this file
Whether the Shield overhaul should be enabled, which includes new mechanics such as parrying and a strength meter. Also includes 3 new enchantments - Parry, Endurance & Stagger
Whether Axes should use the new Cleaving enchantment, as opposed to Sharpness. Cleaving increases both attack damage and the shield disable duration
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.option.foo: Whether a reworked saturation, hunger and exhaustion system should be used
The amount of points required to be considered low on hunger. Defaults to 6, like vanilla
Whether taking damage from another entity should cancel the consumption of an item
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.option.con: Whether soups & stews should stack to 16
Whether snowballs and eggs should inflict knockback
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.option.int: End Reborn integration adds a +1 bonus to Netherite tool damage for consistency with End Reborn's changes
